attributes.action: Reverse the decision for congestion charge to the north/south circular roads
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan has proposed this change which will affect already struggling Londoners and those on the outskirts travelling to work,  local spirts facilities, local health care and A and E departments and will cost £12.50 a day

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
